summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue West, from West Mercer Street to West Republican Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same; 5th Avenue West, from Elliott Avenue West, to West Mercer Street, by constructing sewers with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7980 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
